definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to enjoy/to benefit/to have the use of

sentences.english: The playing of percussion instrument is one of important ways for children to begin music learning.

sentences.english: The Chinese percussion instruments are various kinds and they used in wide ranging.

variant of 協|协[xie2]/to cooperate/combined labor
